mobiles.name: oldstyle baby beholder
mobiles.long_description: You meet a baby beholder's cute gaze!
mobiles.description:
It has a large central eye that blinks like a guppy and eyestalks atop the 
round body which can charm you with its cuteness.  Baby beholders are known for
their playful personality.  Hmmm....  It looks like the baby is teething!

mobiles.name: oldstyle lamia pet
mobiles.long_description: A pet lamia stands here waiting for her next command.
mobiles.description:
This is a creature with the upper torso of a beautiful woman, but the lower
body of a four-legged beast.

mobiles.name: oldstyle citizen man
mobiles.long_description: A citizen of Thalos is here, conversing with everyone.
mobiles.description:
He smiles at you, almost as if he knows you.  He is so friendly, you have no
choice but to reciprocate.

mobiles.name: oldstyle guard imperial cityguard
mobiles.long_description: An imperial cityguard is here, keeping the peace of Thalos.
mobiles.description:
He is dressed in plate, and he looks quite formidable.  At the moment, though,
he is just giggling with a kid running about.

mobiles.name: oldstyle citizen woman female
mobiles.long_description: A female citizen of Thalos is here, showing off her new dress.
mobiles.description:
She is beautiful, dressed in a sundress that sparkles with gems sown in.  She
smiles at you, and your heart flutters at the thought that you have her
attention, if only for a moment.

mobiles.name: oldstyle gordon defender
mobiles.long_description:
Gordon the Brave, the Defender of Thalos, is here, looking at no
one but you, the only stranger in town.
mobiles.description:
Gordon is dressed in full mithril plate, and he looks indestructible.  He eyes
you suspiciously not only because you are a stranger, but because you are an
ARMED stranger.  Better not do any funny stuff in his presence.

mobiles.name: oldstyle priest
mobiles.long_description: A fanatic priest is here, foretelling the destruction of Thalos.
mobiles.description:
The priest must have lost his mind.  He keeps saying that one day, evil will
prevail and take over Thalos and bring the whole city down.  Obviously, no one
listens to this fool.  The priest's right fist is covered in golden silk,
and he clenches it at you.  Other than that, he is dressed all in black.

mobiles.name: oldstyle priest
mobiles.long_description: The priest of Thalos tells you of the glories of this city.
mobiles.description:
He stands here gloriously telling of Thalos's history, how it is now referred by
the world as 'The City of Peace'.  He is very happy to be the high priest here.

mobiles.name: oldstyle golem stone
mobiles.long_description: In the corner you see a large, stone golem faithfully standing watch.
mobiles.description:
It is a big chunk of rock that has been magically formed into a giant
stone creature.  It stands here guarding the city.

mobiles.name: oldstyle mayor
mobiles.long_description: The mayor of Thalos is sitting here, doing his paperwork.
mobiles.description:
He looks very busy, but he takes the time to say, 'Hi!  Welcome to Thalos!'
He looks very proud of his work.

mobiles.name: oldstyle dan barkeep
mobiles.long_description: Dan the Barkeep stands by the counter wiping a glass.
mobiles.description: He looks at you, and says, 'What's your poison, stranger?'

mobiles.name: oldstyle george butcher
mobiles.long_description: George the Butcher is here whacking away at a side of beef.
mobiles.description:
Looking down at you with blood splattered all over his face and apron,
he asks, 'How much you want?'

mobiles.name: oldstyle farmer betty
mobiles.long_description: Farmer Betty looks at you sweetly offering you some apples.
mobiles.description: She smiles at you meekly.

mobiles.name: oldstyle thaellor dwarf
mobiles.long_description: Thaellor is here selling his metal wares.
mobiles.description:
Thaellor sweats rivers and complains about the heat as he pounds the
metal into items of defense and destruction.

mobiles.name: oldstyle ben smith
mobiles.long_description: Ben the Smith sells metal odds and ends to anyone interested.
mobiles.description: Ben tries to pawn his various wares to you.

mobiles.name: oldstyle librarian
mobiles.long_description: The librarian is here shelving books away neatly.
mobiles.description: The librarian looks busy and whispers, 'Shhh!'

mobiles.name: oldstyle scholar boy
mobiles.long_description: A young scholar studies quietly in the corner.
mobiles.description: This young scholar is studying to be a priest.

mobiles.name: oldstyle wizard
mobiles.long_description: An old wizard sits quietly at the counter waiting for a sale.
mobiles.description: This old wizard almost looks like he is about to fall over and sleep.

mobiles.name: oldstyle masseuse woman
mobiles.long_description: A beautiful woman is here offering you a massage.
mobiles.description:
She is beautiful, dressed in a sundress that sparkles with gems sown in.  She
smiles at you, and your heart flutters at the thought that you have her
attention, and you jump to her offer for a massage.

mobiles.name: oldstyle bather man
mobiles.long_description: A man is here bathing.
mobiles.description:
He smiles at you, almost as if he knows you.  He is so friendly, you have no
choice but to reciprocate and join him and the others in the soothing pool.

mobiles.name: oldstyle guard imperial cityguard
mobiles.long_description: An imperial cityguard overseeing patrols in the city.
mobiles.description:
He is dressed in plate, and he looks quite formidable.  At the moment,
he is looking at a map of Thalos aside his fellow co-workers keeping
track of each city patrol.

mobiles.name: oldstyle guard cityguard
mobiles.long_description: An imperial cityguard guards the Grand Gate.
mobiles.description:
He is dressed in plate, and he looks quite formidable.  At the moment,
he is watching the children play with amusement.

mobiles.name: oldstyle doe
mobiles.long_description: A doe munches on grass.
mobiles.description:
This peaceful creature looks at you with big dark eyes.  Her nose twitches as
she sniffs at you, but she goes back to chewing some grass.

mobiles.name: oldstyle deer
mobiles.long_description: A deer stares back at you.
mobiles.description:
The deer looks angered at your intrusion.  He butts his head against you, 
albeit ineffectively.

mobiles.name: oldstyle stag deer
mobiles.long_description: A large deer stag protects his territory.
mobiles.description: He eyes you with contained anger.  You'd better leave him alone!

mobiles.name: oldstyle bunny rabbit
mobiles.long_description: A small bunny pokes from bush to bush.
mobiles.description: This bunny looks so adorable, you wished you had one just like this!

mobiles.name: oldstyle snake
mobiles.long_description: A small snake slithers between the grass.
mobiles.description: Upon careful inspection, you are sure it is NOT a cobra!

mobiles.name: oldstyle druid
mobiles.long_description: A druid is here in meditation.
mobiles.description: He doesn't like you bothering him, but is too polite to ask you to leave.

mobiles.name: oldstyle druidess
mobiles.long_description: A druidess peers at you.
mobiles.description: She wonders why you are staring at her, and how you got in here.

mobiles.name: oldstyle musician bard
mobiles.long_description: A bard sings of the glory of Thalos.
mobiles.description: This musical fellow plays a happy song with his fellow comrades.

mobiles.name: oldstyle musician bard
mobiles.long_description: This bard merrily skips along singing of the glory of Thalos.
mobiles.description: This musical fellow wanders the world singing of the glory of Thalos.

mobiles.name: oldstyle cityguard guard
mobiles.long_description: A cityguard stands here.
mobiles.description: A big, strong, helpful, trustworthy guard.

mobiles.name: oldstyle janitor
mobiles.long_description: A janitor is walking around, cleaning up.

mobiles.name: oldstyle fido dog
mobiles.long_description: Beastly Fido is here.
mobiles.description:
Fido is a small dog that has a foul smell and pieces of rotted meat hanging
around his teeth.

mobiles.name: oldstyle cityguard guard
mobiles.long_description: A cityguard is here, guarding the gate.
mobiles.description: A big, strong, helpful, trustworthy guard.

objects.name: collar
objects.description: A lamia collar is on the ground.

objects.name: breast plate iron
objects.description: A beautiful iron breast plate lies here.

objects.name: staff serpentine
objects.description: A green serpentine staff has been left here.

objects.name: scroll magic
objects.description: A scroll of magical enchantment has been left here.

objects.name: scroll bound
objects.description: A bound scroll of detection lies at your feet.

objects.name: fountain
objects.description: An elaborate white marble fountain is here.

extra_descriptions.description:
You see the most beautiful fountain in the world.  The white marble glistens
as sunlight hits its wet surfaces.  Fish swim around in the inner fountain, and
an exterior fountain is reserved just for drinking.

objects.name: desk
objects.description: A beautiful desk made from a gigantic sea shell is here.

extra_descriptions.description:
The sea shell desk here is just gorgeous.  The creamy white of the table
surface makes you dream of being in a pool swimming among mermaids.

objects.name: cabinet
objects.description: A sturdy glass cabinet is here.

extra_descriptions.description:
A cabinet made of oak and mahogany, this piece of woodmanship is just splendid 
to view.  The wood is varnished with a very strong stain that looks as if it
would last longer than the cabinet itself.

objects.name: mandolin
objects.description: A mandolin lies against the wall.

objects.name: harp golden
objects.description: A beautiful golden harp is waiting to be played.

objects.name: flute silver
objects.description: A brilliant silver flute glimmers from its holster.

objects.name: potion green
objects.description: You see a green potion on the floor.

objects.name: bluish herbs
objects.description: Some bluish herbs are scattered here.

objects.name: purplish herbs
objects.description: Some purplish herbs are scattered here.

objects.name: grayish herbs
objects.description: Some grayish herbs are scattered here.

objects.name: orangish herbs
objects.description: Some orangish herbs are scattered here.

objects.name: sword
objects.description: You see an imperial sword here.

extra_descriptions.description:
You see a sword of great craftsmanship.  Imprinted on the side is:
Merc Industries

objects.name: mace
objects.description: You see an imperial mace here.

extra_descriptions.description:
You see a mace of great craftsmanship.  Imprinted on the side is:
Merc Industries

objects.name: chest plate
objects.description: You see an imperial chest plate here.

extra_descriptions.description:
You see a chest plate of great craftsmanship.  Stamped on the side is:
Merc Industries

objects.name: shield
objects.description: You see an imperial shield here.

extra_descriptions.description:
You see a shield of great craftsmanship.  Imprinted on the side is:
Merc Industries

objects.name: cloak
objects.description: You see an imperial cloak here.

extra_descriptions.description:
You see a cloak of great craftsmanship.  Imprinted on the side is:
Merc Industries

objects.name: helm
objects.description: You see an imperial helm here.

extra_descriptions.description:
You see a helm of great craftsmanship.  Imprinted on the side is:
Merc Industries

objects.name: plate leggings
objects.short_description: a pair of imperial plate leggings
objects.description: You see a pair of imperial plate leggings here.

extra_descriptions.description:
You see plate leggings of great craftsmanship.  Imprinted on the side is:
Merc Industries

objects.name: plate boots
objects.short_description: a pair of imperial plate boots
objects.description: You see a pair of imperial plate boots here.

extra_descriptions.description:
You see plate boots of great craftsmanship.  Imprinted on the side is:
Merc Industries

objects.name: plate gloves
objects.short_description: a pair of imperial plate gloves
objects.description: You see a pair of imperial plate gloves here.

extra_descriptions.description:
You see plate gloves of great craftsmanship.  Imprinted on the side is:
Merc Industries

objects.name: plate sleeves
objects.short_description: a pair of imperial plate sleeves
objects.description: You see a pair of imperial plate sleeves here.

extra_descriptions.description:
You see plate sleeves of great craftsmanship.  Imprinted on the side is:
Merc Industries

objects.name: cape
objects.description: You see an imperial cape here.

extra_descriptions.description:
You see a cape of great craftsmanship.  Imprinted on the side is:
Merc Industries

objects.name: belt
objects.description: You see an imperial belt here.

extra_descriptions.description:
You see a belt of great craftsmanship.  Imprinted on the side is:
Merc Industries

objects.name: metal bracer
objects.description: You see an imperial metal bracer here.

extra_descriptions.description:
You see a metal bracer of great craftsmanship.  Imprinted on the side is:
Merc Industries

objects.name: ring signet
objects.short_description: an imperial city guard signet ring
objects.description: You see a ring with a strange symbol on the floor.

objects.name: imperial banner
objects.description: An imperial war banner is on the floor here.

extra_descriptions.description: This is the official Merc war banner to see you through the darkest realm!

objects.name: two-handed two sword
objects.description: A nice two-handed sword hangs on a hook in the wall.

rooms.name: The Grand Gate of Thalos
rooms.description:
You stand in the archway of a gigantic stone archway. The two
steel gates look indestructible, yet they are elaborate in engravings.  You can
hear laughter and good cheer from the other side of these gates.  Obviously, 
the city is teeming with activity!  There is a small gold plaque on mounted
on the archway.

exits.exit_description: You are saddened at the thought of leaving this beautiful place.

You see happiness everywhere. Houses cover your vision. You see strange cute
beasts walking hand in hand with people.

extra_descriptions.description:
This zone has been heavily modified by Kahn and Hatchet of MERC Industries
and integrated by Kahn of MERC Industries.
copyright 1993

rooms.name: Main Street
rooms.description:
This is a magnificent street, immaculate all over. The streets are filled
with people rushing from building to building and a balmy zephyr blows by
you.  The whole city is teeming with activity.  A cobbled alley leads north
and south.  Children run pass you as they play tag.

exits.exit_description: It's a cobbled alley.
The entrance to the city lies this way.
It's a cobbled alley.
Main Street lies this way.

rooms.name: Main Street
rooms.description:
This is a magnificent street, immaculate all over.  The streets are filled
with people rushing from building to building and a balmy zephyr blows by you.
The whole city is teeming with activity.  On one side is a beautiful house 
while on the other is the entrance to a large mansion.  Sounds of people hard
at work echo within the mansion.  Near the center of town you see a large 
domed building, magnificent and immense.

exits.exit_description: A store lies this way.
Main Street continues back east.
The main building in the city, the City Hall is there.
A lush, green garden path lies this way.

rooms.name: A Garden Path
rooms.description:
A circular path surrounds a magnificent domed temple in the center
of the city. Flowers grow on the sides of the path and the lush trees are 
laden with fruit.  Vines and ivy snake up the sides of the temple, making this
temple truly a blend of nature and man's work of art.

exits.exit_description: The garden path continues around the building.
This is the main street leading to the city's entrance.
The garden path continues around the building.
You can hear music coming from within the temple.

rooms.name: A Garden Path
rooms.description:
A circular path surrounds a magnificent domed temple in the center
of the city. Flowers grow on the sides of the path and the lush trees are
laden with fruit.  Vines and ivy snake up the sides of the temple, making this
temple truly a blend of nature and man's work of art.

exits.exit_description: A side street leads off to the northern half of the city.
The garden path continues around the building.
The garden path continues around the building.

rooms.name: A garden path
rooms.description:
A circular path surrounds a magnificent domed temple in the center
of the city. Flowers grow on the sides of the path and the lush trees are
laden with fruit.  Vines and ivy snake up the sides of the temple, making this
temple truly a blend of nature and man's work of art.

exits.exit_description: The garden path continues around the building.
You can hear music coming from within the temple.

rooms.name: A Garden Path
rooms.description:
A circular path surrounds a magnificent domed temple in the center
of the city. Flowers grow on the sides of the path and the lush trees are
laden with fruit.  Vines and ivy snake up the sides of the temple, making this
temple truly a blend of nature and man's work of art.

exits.exit_description: The garden path continues around the building.
A small side street leads to the southern half of the city.

rooms.name: The market place
rooms.description:
You stand in the middle of a large square lined on each side with
baskets, carts, and stands of all shapes and sizes.  The little shops are 
filled with goods sold to the demanding public.

exits.exit_description: A small table is here, laden with fine jewelery and gems sold by the jeweler.
Fruits and vegetables are piled on boxes waiting to be sold and eaten.
The market place continues.

rooms.name: The market place
rooms.description:
You stand in the middle of a large square lined on each side with
baskets, carts, and stands of all shapes and sizes.  The little shops are
filled with goods sold to the demanding public.

exits.exit_description:
Beautiful carpets and enormous bales of silk are being stared with awe by
the citizens.
The center of the market lies this way.
>From the great smell, the meat and poultry stand must be south!

rooms.name: A Side Street
rooms.description:
This small side street leads east and west into back alleys while
to the south you see a beautifully designed temple. Shrieks of little
children playing games in the distance catch your attention.

rooms.name: A Side Street
rooms.description:
You are in the common section of the city. More buildings made of
clay and stone be dazzles you. Most of these homes are designed so
beautifully you just cant keep your eyes off them.  The street
continues north and south and buildings line the street.

exits.exit_description: A small doorway leads into a little humble dwelling.
A small clay dwelling sits here.

rooms.name: A Side Street
rooms.description:
This small side street leads away from the garden path to the south.
Around you stand large numbers of commoners' houses.  Many citizens
pass by you with a friendly hello.  You almost feel like home here.

exits.exit_description: An unusually tall dwelling stands looming over you.
A garden path circles around the temple.
Here lies a small stone house with a thatched roof.

rooms.name: A side street
rooms.description:
This small side street leads south away from the temple into the
business section of town. To the east is the famous City Hall of Thalos.  
Well disciplined guards stand at attention, watching over the city hall, but
you don't see any source of threats in THIS city.  North is a garden path,
west is a smithy, and this side street continues south.

exits.exit_description: A small garden path encircles the temple.

You see what is most definitely city hall.  This building is the most
elaborate of all the building here in Thalos.

Inside the building you see long pieces of metal, an oven, and some
anvils.  Obviously a smithy.

rooms.name: A side street
rooms.description:
This small side street is lined with great beautifully designed
buildings. To the north is the magnificent temple while to the
east lies the entrance to a small friendly tavern. The street continues
north and south.

exits.exit_description:
From the looks of it, this is a very impressive two story abode.
The entire first floor is covered with a huge marble bar with merry men
telling tall tales and drinking their fill.

This seems to be the only guild house in the entire city. You feel uneasy
about this building.  For some reason it seems not to belong.

rooms.name: A side street
rooms.description:
You are at the end of a long street leading to the center of the city.
A long alley runs east and west.

rooms.name: Under another grand watchtower
rooms.description:
You stand at the base of a tall ivy covered watchtower built to
protect the city from invaders.  You get the feeling of safety here in
Thalos.

rooms.name: A back alley
rooms.description:
This alley leads to the rear of meat stand. The aroma of fresh and
char-broiled meat catches your sense of smell.  You wipe the drool
off your chin the instant you know it is there.

exits.exit_description: You see the back-side of the market place meat stand.
A tall watchtower stands a silent vigil over the city.

rooms.name: The meat stand
rooms.description:
A large stand has been set up here with metal hooks and wooden racks
in the background.  Hanging on the hooks are huge slabs of meat
and other game.  This stand is packed with produce, and a sudden burst
of laughter catches you by surprise as little children play around
your ankles.

exits.exit_description: The market place lies this way.

This is a cart full of fresh vegetables and fruits.  You are almost
tempted to take some.

rooms.name: A back alley
rooms.description:
A narrow alley leads east to a wider street and west to one of
the city watchtowers.

exits.exit_description: A small side street welcomes you.
A tall watchtower stands a silent vigil over the city.

rooms.name: The guild house
rooms.description:
You are standing in this city's ONLY guild house.  Tables and chairs
are set about for the occupants' comfort.  Weapons are stacked neatly on the
weapons rack.  Each weapon looks polished, sharpened, and oiled.
Draped along the back wall is the proud banner of Thalos in all its glory.

exits.exit_description: A small side street runs past the building.

rooms.name: The produce stand
rooms.description:
A large cart sits here carrying fresh fruit and vegetables.
Hungry children swarm all about the tasty treats the merchants are
giving out for free.

exits.exit_description: The market place is jammed packed with people scurrying about.
A strong aromatic smell emanates from the meat stand next to you.

rooms.name: The smithy
rooms.description:
In here you find tools and anvils used to make various weapons
and items. The walls are fully stocked with pieces of armor and weaponry.

exits.exit_description: A small side street runs past the building.

rooms.name: The tapestry stand
rooms.description:
Beautiful tapestries and rugs hang all over the walls.  Fancy
robes and various articles of clothing hang about for sale. You stare with
awe at how much work must have been put into these cloths.

exits.exit_description: A fine jewelry stand lies majestically next to you.
The market place is swarming with people scurrying about.

rooms.name: A back alley
rooms.description:
A narrow alley leads north to one of the city watchtowers while
to the south there lies a market stand full of expensive clothes and rugs.

exits.exit_description: A tall watchtower stands a silent vigil over the city.

rooms.name: Under the watchtower
rooms.description:
You stand under one of the city watchtowers built to protect
the city from invaders.  You know that you are safe from any danger.

exits.exit_description: Above you stands a tall watchtower.

rooms.name: The jewelery stand
rooms.description:
A table stands covered with fine jewelery and gems.  The jeweler
stands proudly over his collection as he polishes and cleans each one.

exits.exit_description:
The market place is packed with people scurrying about doing their
business.
Next to you is a stand full of fine clothes and expensive rugs.

rooms.name: A simple clay dwelling
rooms.description:
This is a very plain house with a few chairs and a bed.
A warmed and lit fireplace suggests that the dwelling is currently
occupied.  You should leave before the owner finds you here.

exits.exit_description: Outside is a small side street.

rooms.name: A stone dwelling
rooms.description:
This small house is the dwelling of a humble citizen of Thalos.
A few rafters stand with thatched straw blowing with the wind gusts
blowing through the city.

exits.exit_description: A small side street runs past the house.

rooms.name: A back alley
rooms.description:
A narrow alley leads east to one of the city watchtowers and west to
a small side street.

rooms.name: A busy shop
rooms.description:
From the outside this place looks like an ordinary building,
but inside these cramped quarters you discover a shop filled with
armor, weapons, and various other goods. A small sign posted on the wall
flutters in the wind.

exits.exit_description: A small side street runs past the shop.

rooms.name: The Tavern of the Sun
rooms.description:
A glorious place, this tavern is second home for many citizens of
Thalos.  Tables and chairs are set in rows, bottles and glasses filled, and
a small performance stage teaming with dazzling entertainment. Musical
instruments and personal belongings lie in piles belonging to each member
of this room.

exits.exit_description: A small side street runs past the tavern.

rooms.name: South wing of the city hall
rooms.description:
You stand in a large room attached to this end of the hallway which
leads back north to the reception area. Pedestals and columns stand
faithfully.  Valuable items hang from the walls each to be admired
by onlookers.  Chairs lie around, and a large curved desk. To the east
is a vine-covered archway leading out into a private courtyard.

exits.exit_description: The long hallway leads back to the main reception area of the city hall.

rooms.name: The city hall
rooms.description:
This is the main reception area of Thalos' city hall. The walls have
been painted in pure white and thick lush carpet line the floor wall to wall.
A side door on the west wall allows you to go out to one of the city's side 
streets.  Hallways lead south and east.

exits.exit_description: Main street runs past the city hall.
A hallway leads to the east wing of the city hall.
A hallway leads to the south wing of the city hall.

rooms.name: East wing of the city hall
rooms.description:
Here lies fancy office, possibly the mayor's. A few green plants
and pieces of furniture make this place breathtaking.  There is a large
glass cabinet along the wall. A long hallway leads west back to the
reception area and an ivy-covered archway leads south into a private
courtyard.

rooms.name: The private gardens and courtyard of Thalos
rooms.description:
You stare in awe as the beauty of this place takes you by
surprise.  Exotic flowers and trees are planted in neat rows and lawn
benches line the walk ways.  A large marble fountain in the center of the
courtyard stands. Above stands one of the four watchtowers. Archways
north and west lead back into the city hall.

rooms.name: A small guard house
rooms.description:
This is the barracks for Thalos' cityguards.  Guards populate this
shack ready, willing, and able to ward off any trouble.  This small
shack stands guarding both to the entrance to the city and to the city hall.

exits.exit_description: The alley runs by this building.

rooms.name: An impressive house
rooms.description:
This house houses the Defender of Thalos.  He represents all that
is good and right in this city.  As the most skilled fighting machine,
he is the commander of the guard.

exits.exit_description: Main street runs past this dwelling.

rooms.name: A Public Library
rooms.description:
This seems to be the tallest structure in the city.  Rows and rows of books
line the 20 foot tall bookcases, and a quiet serenity can be felt by all here.

exits.exit_description: Another room in the library is here.
A small side street winds past this building.
You see a second floor to the library.

rooms.name: The Library Addition
rooms.description:
There are more shelves and tables here.  Vials of strange potions line a
section of the wall, and books and other items of power line another.  The exit
is to the west.

exits.exit_description: The main room of the library is there.

rooms.name: A back alley
rooms.description:
A narrow back alley goes south to main street and north towards
a watchtower.  People quietly pass you by.

exits.exit_description: You see a mighty watchtower north.
Main street runs past here.

rooms.name: A back alley
rooms.description:
A narrow back alley leads north to one of the city watchtowers
and south towards main street.  The shade cast by the watchtower is very
refreshing.

exits.exit_description: A tall watchtower stands a silent vigil over the city.
The cobbled alley continues on.

rooms.name: Under a watchtower
rooms.description:
You stand under a tall watchtower. Narrow back alleys lead west and
south and a sturdy ladder leads up into the tower.

exits.exit_description: You see up the powerful watchtower.

rooms.name: A bath house
rooms.description:
This is the bath house for the commoners of the city. Hot steamy water 
wells up from a hole in the floor. Obviously there is a hot spring located 
under the city (making the decision to put a city here seem much more 
reasonable). To the west is another room.

exits.exit_description: A cobbled alley is there.
Another resting room is here.

rooms.name: A back alley
rooms.description:
A narrow back alley leads west to a small side street and east to one
of the city watchtowers. Great amounts of steam issue forth from the
building to the south.  It looks very inviting.

exits.exit_description: A watchtower stands a silent vigil over the city.
You hear laughter and splashing.
A side street greets you.

rooms.name: A Resting Room
rooms.description:
You are in a resting room.  Soft mats line the floor, and you see many
people just relaxing on them.  The comfort of this place is so inviting, you 
want to join them.  Great amounts of steam issue forth from the hole in the 
east wall.

exits.exit_description: A small side street runs past the building.

rooms.name: On the second floor of the library
rooms.description:
You see more books here.  Through windows, you have a glorious view of
a nearby bay.  Birds fly by your window.

rooms.name: The north-west watchtower
rooms.description:
You stand atop one of the city watchtowers. The view is magnificent
from here and you can see all the way to the western mountains.  You are 
confident nothing can touch this tower.

exits.exit_description: The city lies below.

rooms.name: The south-west watchtower
rooms.description:
You stand atop one of the city watchtowers. The view is magnificent
from here and you can see all the way to the western mountains. To the
south bay stretches to the horizon.  You are confident nothing can touch this
tower.

exits.exit_description: The city lies below.

rooms.name: The north-east watchtower
rooms.description:
You stand atop one of the city watchtowers. The view is magnificent
from here.  Green fields stretch to the horizon.  You are confident nothing
can touch this tower.

exits.exit_description: The city lies below.

rooms.name: The Temple of Thalos
rooms.description:
You stand within one of the most holy places in the realm. This stunning 
domed temple houses the city's worshipers en masse. Long benches line the 
aisles and the altar glistens with the gold and platinum inlay.The walls and 
roof are all made of ceramic, making this place reflect the sun well.  
    The greenery around the temple itself makes this place a great blend of
nature and man's works of art.

exits.exit_description: A side street leads to the northern half of the city.
Main street leads out to the main gate of the city.

rooms.name: A back alley
rooms.description:
A narrow alley leads east to a wider street and west to one of
the city watchtowers.  Little kids play tag around you.

exits.exit_description: A tall watchtower stands a silent vigil over the city.
A small side street greets you.

rooms.name: Under a watchtower
rooms.description:
You stand at the base of a tall watchtower built to protect the city
from invaders.  From the looks of things, its doing a great job.

rooms.name: A back alley
rooms.description: A narrow alley leads south to one of the city watchtowers.

exits.exit_description: The alley continues to the north.
A tall watchtower stands a silent vigil over the city.

rooms.name: The south-east watchtower
rooms.description:
You stand atop one of the city watchtowers. The view is magnificent
from here and you can see all the way to the western mountains. To the
south the you see the bay.  You're confident nothing can touch this tower.

exits.exit_description: The city lies below.

rooms.name: A back alley
rooms.description:
A narrow alley leads north to the main street, and south toward a tall
watchtower.  A building is to the west.

exits.exit_description: You see main street.
You see a little building.

rooms.name: A trail at the end of the dwarf forest
rooms.description:
The trail ends here, with tall, leafy, green trees all around you.
To the west, you can see a huge beautiful and radiant city.  Something
about it gives you a relaxed feeling.  To the east is your way back home.

exits.exit_description: You see the trail.
You see Thalos!

rooms.name: A trail at the end of the dwarf forest
rooms.description:
A side trail here leads from the dwarf forest.  It is definitely milder
here.  The trail continues to the east from here.

exits.exit_description: You see the bend ahead of you.
You see the trail continue on.

rooms.name: The dwarf forest
rooms.description:
You see tall, healthy green trees here.  The trail bends north to
west from here.

exits.exit_description: You see the trail bend north.
You see the trail bend west.

rooms.name: The dwarf forest
rooms.description:
You see more big green trees here.  It looks almost as if this place was
blessed by a god to be green and mild.  The trail leads north and south.

exits.exit_description: You see the trail continue north.
You see the trail continue south.

rooms.name: The dwarf forest
rooms.description:
You see more big green trees here.  It looks almost as if this place was
blessed by a god to be green and mild.  The trail leads north and south.

exits.exit_description: You see the trail continue north.
You see the trail continue south.

rooms.name: The dwarf forest
rooms.description:
You see many big green trees here.  You see many leaves on these huge
trees.  Grass layer the ground with 2 inches of padding.

exits.exit_description: You see the trail continue north.
You see the trail continue south.

rooms.name: The Cross Roads
rooms.description:
The roads cross here.  Midgaard is to the west.  To the east, you see the
stately oaks and poplars of the holy grove.  A wide path leads south through
the dwarven forest.  To the north is a very desolate trail.

rooms.name: The Lane
rooms.description:
You are strolling along a pleasant, shady lane. The road is lined on both
sides by tall, stately trees which lend the scene with a sense of quiet
serenity. You can follow the road north or south.

rooms.name: City Entrance
rooms.description:
You stand on the outskirts of a construction site - Midgaard; the capital
of this land. The road leads east into the peace and quiet - and dangers -
of the forest; and to the west it becomes the main street of the town;
surrounded by building foundations of unfinished shops, houses, and temple.

rooms.name: The Plains
rooms.description:
You are standing on the plains. This is a vast desolate place where the
wind can howl undisturbed since nothing but you bars its way. However you
are not the first to wander here. Before you somebody has left footprints.
The footprints make a path that looks rather bewildered and is not the kind
of path to lead to anywhere significant or important but it seems to have
made up its mind to enter the hills far away north.  A little distance
further, you lose the trail and decide not to get lost.

rooms.name: The holy grove
rooms.description:
You are standing amidst the ancient oaks and poplars in the holy grove. You
can feel a strange sensation of contentedness and relief seeping through You,
as if great burdens have been lifted from Your shoulders. From here, friendly-
looking paths lead east and south.

exits.exit_description: The path wind its way through the tall trees, disappearing out of sight.
The path wind its way through the tall trees, disappearing out of sight.

rooms.name: The holy grove
rooms.description:
You are standing amidst the ancient oaks and poplars in the holy grove. You
feel unusually happy here, as if great burdens have been lifted from Your
shoulders. From here, pleasant-looking paths lead east, west and south.

exits.exit_description: The path wind its way through the tall trees, towards a clearing faintly seen.

The path wind its way through the tall trees, towards an open area barely
visible in the distance.
The path wind its way through the tall trees, disappearing out of sight.

rooms.name: A clearing in the woods
rooms.description:
You are standing in a clearing in the light woods. Somehow, this place
seems powerfully DIFFERENT from the rest of the forest, as if something is
severely strained in the fabric of reality here.

exits.exit_description:
A small, narrow path winds north, and is quickly lost in the bushes. It
looks quite a wilderness there!

There is a path winding its way south through the tall poplars, disappearing
out of sight some 100 yds. away.
There is a friendly-looking path leading west through the tall trees.

rooms.name: The holy grove
rooms.description:
You are standing amidst the ancient oaks and poplars in the holy grove. You
feel calm and relaxed here, as if great burdens have been lifted from Your
shoulders. From here, pleasant-looking paths lead east, north and south. To
the west, through the trees, You can see the road to Midgaard's construction
site.

exits.exit_description: The path wind its way through the tall trees, disappearing out of sight.
The path wind its way through the tall trees, towards a clearing faintly seen.
The path wind its way through the tall trees, into the grove.

Through the trees, you can see the Midgaard road. Far to the west, You can
barely glimpse the construction of the city itself.

rooms.name: The sacred glade
rooms.description:
You are standing in the middle of the sacred glades, where the citizens of
Thalos come to celebrate the spring, where farmers give thanks for bountiful
harvest in the fall, and where lovers stroll in summer. You feel seasons of
remembered happiness and joy taking Your sorrows and worries away from You,
leaving You calm and invigorate, ready for the world. Paths lead into the
holy grove to the east, north and west, while to the south a wide, sunny field
slopes down to a sparkling lake.

exits.exit_description: The path wind its way north, disappearing through the tall trees.
The path wind its way through the tall trees, disappearing out of sight.

To the south, a wide, sunny field stretch out, sloping down towards a brightly
glittering lake.
The path wind its way west between stately poplars and oaks.

rooms.name: The holy grove
rooms.description:
You are standing amidst the ancient oaks and poplars in the holy grove. You
can feel a strange sensation of joy and calm seeping through You, as if great
burdens have been lifted from Your shoulders. To the south, You glimpse an open
area through the trees, while paths lead away north and west.

exits.exit_description: The path wind its way through the tall trees, disappearing out of sight.

To the south, just beyond the trees, you can see a wide green lawn, and past
the lawn, a softly shimmering, rainbow-colored dome covering the foundation
for a structure.
The path wind its way through the tall trees, disappearing out of sight.

extra_descriptions.description:
The foundation looks like it is for a sprawling, two-story affair with three
wings.  On the ground is some building material, marble would do, if marble
changed color slowly, continuously, through the entire spectrum.  There are
also large panes of glass stacked over near one of the corners of the
foundation.

rooms.name: The holy grove
rooms.description:
You are standing amidst the tall, majestic trees in the southern end of the
holy grove. Paths lead north and east. To the east, You can see a wide, open
field, sloping gently down towards a bright, glittering lake. Somehow, here
you feel an inexplicable happiness, as if the world's troubles no longer
really matter to you.

exits.exit_description:
The path leading north is soon lost out of sight amongst the ancient oaks and
poplars.

To the east, the path leads out into a wide, sunny summer's field, sloping
south towards a beautiful lake. Past the field You can see the construction
of a large foundation for a structure shimmering gently in all the rainbow's
colours.

extra_descriptions.description:
The foundation looks like it is for a sprawling, two-story affair with three
wings.  On the ground is some building material, marble would do, if marble
changed color slowly, continuously, through the entire spectrum.  There are
also large panes of glass stacked over near one of the corners of the
foundation.

rooms.name: The sunny field
rooms.description:
You are standing in the middle of a wide, summery, sunlit field. There is a
fragrance of spring in the air, a sound of summer and a feeling of eternal
Saturday afternoon. To the south is a clear, sparkling lake, and to the north
and west is the holy grove. In the wood's edge, to the east, is construction,
shimmering softly through the colors of the rainbow. You feel as if You
could spend the rest of your life here, lying on your back and looking at the
patterns of the clouds as they gently drift across the sky.

exits.exit_description: There is a path leading north towards the sacred glade.
There is a small path leading into the woods to the west.

extra_descriptions.description:
The foundation looks like it is for a sprawling, two-story affair with three
wings.  On the ground is some building material, marble would do, if marble
changed color slowly, continuously, through the entire spectrum.  There are
also large panes of glass stacked over near one of the corners of the
foundation.

rooms.name: The croquet lawn
rooms.description:
You are standing on a immaculately manicured green lawn, the kind you only
get after 200 years of meticulous work. There is a winding stone path leading
from the wood's edge to the north, to the softly shimmering, rainbow-colored
dome covering construction to the south. This place enjoys a perpetual cool,
sunny summers after-noon.

exits.exit_description: To the north, the winding stone path leads into the holy grove.

extra_descriptions.description:
The foundation looks like it is for a sprawling, two-story affair with three
wings.  On the ground is some building material, marble would do, if marble
changed color slowly, continuously, through the entire spectrum.  There are
also large panes of glass stacked over near one of the corners of the
foundation.

rooms.name: The Void
rooms.description:
You are standing in the middle of something you cannot explain.  You see
stars yet you cannot see what you are standing on.  You are not standing
on any sort of physical 'ground' as you can see yet you are not floating
either.  Occasionally, the starry 'sky' fades into a fuzzy, yet bright,
rainbow then back to its normal state.  In the middle of this room is
a ladder standing vertical.

exits.exit_description: You see stars.
You see a fuzzy portal of some sort and a little green.
You see stars.
You see stars.
You see stars.

rooms.name: The Void
rooms.description:
You are standing in the middle of something you cannot explain.  You see
stars yet you cannot see what you are standing on.  You are not standing
on any sort of physical 'ground' as you can see yet you are not floating
either.  Occasionally, the starry 'sky' fades into a fuzzy, yet bright,
rainbow then back to its normal state.

exits.exit_description: You see stars.
You see stars.
You see stars.
You see stars.
You see stars.
You see stars.

rooms.name: The Void
rooms.description:
You are standing in the middle of something you cannot explain.  You see
stars yet you cannot see what you are standing on.  You are not standing
on any sort of physical 'ground' as you can see yet you are not floating
either.  Occasionally, the starry 'sky' fades into a fuzzy, yet bright,
rainbow then back to its normal state.

exits.exit_description: You see stars.
You see stars.
You see stars.
You see stars.
You see stars.
You see stars.

rooms.name: The Void
rooms.description:
You are standing in the middle of something you cannot explain.  You see
stars yet you cannot see what you are standing on.  You are not standing
on any sort of physical 'ground' as you can see yet you are not floating
either.  Occasionally, the starry 'sky' fades into a fuzzy, yet bright,
rainbow then back to its normal state.  In the middle of this room is
a ladder standing vertical.

exits.exit_description: You see stars.
You see a fuzzy portal of some sort and a little green.
You see stars.
You see stars.
You see stars.

rooms.name: The Temple Of Midgaard
rooms.description:
You are in the southern end of the temple hall in the Temple of Midgaard.
The temple has been constructed from giant marble blocks, eternal in
appearance, and most of the walls are covered by ancient wall paintings
picturing Gods, Giants and peasants.
   Large steps lead down through the grand temple gate, descending the huge
mound upon which the temple is built and ends on the temple square below.
   You notice that this building is quite new.  A small plaque is on this wall.

exits.exit_description: At the northern end of the temple hall is a statue and a huge altar.
You see the temple square.

extra_descriptions.description:
This entire world has been integrated, modified, debugged, and enhanced by
Hatchet, Kahn, and Furey of MERC Industries to be run by any MERC Mud.
1992 December 17

rooms.name: The Temple Square
rooms.description:
You are standing on the temple square.  Huge marble steps lead up to the
temple gate.  The ground is just dirt but there are plans to make the road
cobble stone.  Just south of here you see a blooming market square, the
center of Midgaard.

exits.exit_description: You see the temple.
You see the Market Square.

rooms.name: Market Square
rooms.description:
You are standing on the market square, the Square of Midgaard.  It seems
that a large, peculiar looking statue is being built here in the middle of
the square.  Roads lead to the north and east, north to the temple square,
east is the main street.

exits.exit_description: You see the temple square.
You see the main street.

extra_descriptions.description:
What you see is an uncompleted statue of what you think is the Midgaard
mascot.

rooms.name: The Main Street
rooms.description:
You are on Main Street crossing through this booming town.  The main
street continues east.  To the west you see and hear a small market place.

exits.exit_description: You see Main Street.
You see the market square.

rooms.name: The Main Street
rooms.description:
The main street, to the east you leave town and to the west the street
leads to the market square.

exits.exit_description: You see the city gate.
You see the main street leading to the market square.

rooms.name: Inside the East Gate of Midgaard
rooms.description:
You are by two small newly built towers that have been built into the
city wall and connected with a footbridge across the heavy wooden gate.
Main Street leads west from here.

exits.exit_description: You see the city gate.
You see Main Street.

extra_descriptions.description:
It is built from large grey rocks that have been fastened to each other with
some kind of mortar.  It is far too high to climb.

Both of the towers are built from large grey rocks that have been fastened to
each other with some kind of mortar, just like the city wall.

It is a set of very big double doors made from hard wood.  They have been
reinforced with large iron bands to make them even more sturdy.  One of the
doors is equipped with a very big lock.

It is too high up to reach but it looks as if one easily could walk across it
from one tower to the other.

rooms.name: Outside the East Gate of Midgaard
rooms.description:
You are by two small towers that have been built into the city wall and
connected with a footbridge across the heavy wooden gate.  To the east the
plains stretch out in the distance.

exits.exit_description: You see the plains.
You see the city gate.

extra_descriptions.description:
It is built from large grey rocks that have been fastened to each other with
some kind of mortar.  It is far too high to climb.

Both of the towers are built from large grey rocks that have been fastened to
each other with some kind of mortar, just like the city wall.

It is a set of very big double doors made from hard wood.  They have been
reinforced with large iron bands to make them even more sturdy.  One of the
doors is equipped with a very big lock.

It is too high up to reach but it looks as if one easily could walk across it
from one tower to the other.

rooms.name: By the Temple Altar
rooms.description:
You are by the temple altar in the northern end of the Temple of Midgaard.
A huge altar made from white polished marble is standing in front of you and
behind it is a ten foot tall sitting statue of Odin, the King of the Gods.

exits.exit_description: You see the southern end of the temple.

extra_descriptions.description:
The statue represents the one-eyed Odin sitting on a his throne.  He has
long, grey hair and beard and a strict look on his face.  On top of the
throne, just above his shoulders, his two ravens Hugin and Munin are sitting
and at his feet are his wolves Gere and Freke.

Even though the altar is more than ten feet long it appears to be made from a
single block of white virgin marble.
